Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.cliviews

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli.cliviews
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.cli
     
  • Class
    Description
    AlreadyStartedView
    This view is displayed when a player tries to join a game which has already started
    BoardView
    The BoardView manages the printing of the board.
    ChatView
    The chat view is accessed when the user wants to display chat messages.
    CliView
    Interface describing a generic view of the text user interface
    CommonGoalCardsView
    The common goal card view displays all the common goal cards with the relative points.
    EndGameResultsView
    This view displays the name of the winner of the game and the points made by each player
    GameAbortedView
    The aborted game view is rendered when the game is aborted (because a client has lost connection or because the server is no longer online)
    HelpView
    The help view is used to present the user all the usable commands.
    LobbyView
    The lobby view is used to draw the game lobby before the start of the game
    LoginView
    The login view is used to prompt the user to log into the server with a username
    MultipleShelvesView
    This view displays the shelf of each player
    NotAdmittedView
    This view is displayed when a player is not admitted to a game after waiting in queue
    NotJoinedView
    This view is showed for a brief period of time, after the user has logged in but isn't in a lobby yet.
    PersonalGoalCardView
    This view is used to show the personal goal cards of a player
    PickFromBoardView
    The pick from board view displays a prompt to the user reminding it to pick a tile from the board.
    PickPlayersView
    This view is used to prompt the player who's creating the lobby to insert the wanted number of players.
    PointsView
    This view is used to show the points made by each player
    ReloadDecisionView
    This view is used to ask the admin of the lobby to decide to reload a game or not when a saved game is found and the users match.
    SelectColumnView
    This view shows the player its own shelf and displays a message requesting the insertion of the column in which to put the picked cards
    ShelfView
    This view displays the shelf of the player.
    WaitingForLobbyView
    This view is shown to logged in player who haven't joined a lobby yet as it's being created.
    WaitingForTurnView
    This view is shown to each player when it's not their turn to play.
